protein.specific_function: Transports folate across the inner membranes of mitochondria.

reference.reference_text: Titus SA, Moran RG: Retrovirally mediated complementation of the glyB phenotype. Cloning of a human gene encoding the carrier for entry of folates into mitochondria. J Biol Chem. 2000 Nov 24;275(47):36811-7.
